EmailTemplate.name: Publication Withheld Email
EmailTemplate.subject: FPR {!PubReviewTeam__c.Publication__c} Has Been Withheld
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Do not reply to this email message.
FPR {!PubReviewTeam__c.PubIDLink__c} has been withheld by {!PubReviewTeam__c.Reviewer__c}. To expedite the process contact the withholding reviewer directly to address their concerns. The updated version will need to be submitted to FPR for a subsequent review cycle. Contact your assigned FPR coordinator, {!PubReviewTeam__c.AssignedFPRCFF__c}, if you have questions or need support.
FPR reviewers, no further action is required for this FPR record.
{!PubReviewTeam__c.PubIDLink__c}
Thank you, FPR System
